GS26sarvmtsu:847: jaḍātmavāde kaivalyasya śūnyakalpatā cāparihāryā pāṣāṇakalpatā vāstheyā /
GS26sarvmtsu:851: jñeyaṃ ca tad jñānaṃ ceti virodhāt /
GS26sarvmtsu:854: ātmanyapyasiddhasya jñānasyārthaprakāśakatve arthasya jñānaprakāśakatāpi syād, aviśeṣāt /
GS26sarvmtsu:856: teṣāṃ ca buddhivṛttiviśeṣatvena jaḍatvānna svataḥ prakāśātmakatā saṅgacchata iti cidātmasānnidhyādeva tathātvamāstheyam /
GS26sarvmtsu:857: ''tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti''; iti śruteḥ /
GS26sarvmtsu:874: tasmāt svarūpatvena dharmatvena vā bhedo na nirvoḍhuṃ śakyaḥ śakreṇāpīti /
GS26sarvmtsu:891_0: iti śrutestasyāḥ pratijīvaṃ bhedaścāstīti yuge yuge mumukṣavo jīvā vāsudevasaṅkarṣaṇapradyumnāniruddhākhyacaturvyūhātmano
GS26sarvmtsu:894: ajñānīni bahūnyasaṃkhyavapuṣo jīvānmumukṣūnapi jñānājñānasamāśrayādanuyugaṃ teṣāṃ ca niḥśreyasam /
GS26sarvmtsu:900: nirguṇabrahmapradhānānāśaṅkarabhagavatpādādīnāmaupaniṣadānāṃ paurāṇikānāṃ ca ṣaḍvidhāṣṭavidhapramāṇavādināṃ paramārthataḥ saccidānandabrahmaikameva tattvam /
GS26sarvmtsu:902: pramātṛpramāṇaprameyātmakasya viśvasya tasmin kalpitatvena tataḥ pṛthagasattvāt,
GS26sarvmtsu:913: na khalvekaṃ svaprakāśaṃ ca tattvamanapekṣyānekātmakasya jaḍasya viśvasya siddhiḥ sādhayituṃ śakyate /
GS26sarvmtsu:918: sā hi idami sitabhāsvaravastumātratvena jñātāpi svena rūpeṇājñātā satī rajatānubhavasaṃskāravataḥ puṃsaḥ svāvidyāvijṛmbhitarajatābhāsātmanā bhāsate /
GS26sarvmtsu:919: evamātmāpyahamiti prakāśadravyamātratvena jñāyamāno 'pi saccidānandātmakena svena rūpeṇājñātaḥ sannātmāvidyāvijṛmbhitajagajjīveśvarātmakaṃ bhedaprapañcamātmani paśyatīti /
GS26sarvmtsu:921: asmin pakṣe 'pi vyavahāradaśāyāṃ dṛg dṛśyaśceti dvau padārthau /
GS26sarvmtsu:949: iyameva kvacidavidyeti kvacit prakṛtiriti kvacidakṣaramiti kvacicchaktiriti kvacinmoha iti cocyate /
GS26sarvmtsu:950: (tadvata ātmanaḥ sakāśādākāśādīni pañca bhūtāni tebhyaścidātmādhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ samaṣṭivyaṣṭiśarīrāṇi cotpadyanta iti vedāntinaḥ /
GS26sarvmtsu:954: asmin pakṣe vyavahāradaśāyāṃ dṛg dṛśyaṃ ceti dvau padārthau /
GS26sarvmtsu:962: tebhyaḥ samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpāṇi śarīrāṇi cotpadyanta iti vedāntinaḥ /
GS26sarvmtsu:968: jñānaśakteḥ sāttvikāhaṃkārād digādicaturdaśakaraṇadevatā antaḥkaraṇāni ca jāyante /
GS26sarvmtsu:970: tānyetāni mahadādyavanyantāni māyāvinā puruṣeṇa preritānyanyonyaṃ militvā haimaṃ brahmāṇḍamārabhante /
GS26sarvmtsu:971: tatra ca caturdaśa bhuvanāni carturvidhaśarīrāṇi ca bhavantīti,
GS26sarvmtsu:972: teṣu ca deheṣu sarvanidānabhūtaścidātmā sākṣitvenābhimānitvena praviśati /
GS26sarvmtsu:984: sarvakṣetreṣveka eva sthitaḥ san sarvānkṣetrajñānniyamayati ca /
